Name: Teratini VR
About the game: If you purchased this game prior to Sept 2017, please contact us for a complimentary key to The Afterwoods. Aftter we're able to validate proof of purchase, we'll send you a key. Thanks! ------- In this VR adventure you are the long foretold mage who will restore life to Teratini, a land decimated by invaders. To succeed in your quest, you'll need to train dragons, wield a magic staff, and learn to fly to defeat enemies and reclaim land that was lost long ago. Set in a fantasy world, Teratini VR game play is a cross between tennis, dodge ball, and sword fighting. Neat Stuff Many enemy variations, abilities, and attack formations. Train, fight, and level up with your dragon. Things to know before you buy or try Not the best game if you are sensitive to heights.
